mapper.select: SELECT dbt7051Kosei."shichosonShokibetsuID" AS dbt7051Kosei_shichosonShokibetsuID, dbt7051Kosei."shichosonCode" AS dbt7051Kosei_shichosonCode, dbt7051Kosei."shichosonMeisho" AS dbt7051Kosei_shichosonMeisho, dbT7022Shori."taishoKaishiTimestamp" AS dbT7022Shori_taishoKaishiTimestamp, dbT7022Shori."taishoShuryoTimestamp" AS dbT7022Shori_taishoShuryoTimestamp FROM rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" dbt7051Kosei LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7022ShoriDateKanri" dbT7022Shori ON dbt7051Kosei."shichosonCode" = dbT7022Shori."shichosonCode" WHERE dbt7051Kosei."gappeiKyuShichosonKubun" ='0' AND dbT7022Shori."subGyomuCode" ='DBU' AND dbT7022Shori."shoriName" ='介護住民票個別事項連携情報作成【広域運用】' ORDER BY dbt7051Kosei."shichosonShokibetsuID"
